pages.title: Magical Wood
pages.text: You can't even think to make progress without some Ash Wood. Why? Because the Ash is a magical tree. Yeah, it might be exactly like any other wood you've already seen, but Ash is special. Unlike Birch for example, Ash is a very strong wood that doesn't impede the flow of Mana. So your job right now is to find some Ash trees and carve some Blank Runes out of its wood.
